name: Vibhor Mungee
about_me: I am Vibhor, an ardent full stack developer, with 9+ years of IT experience, specializing in development of Frontend- Mobile (Android, iOS, Cross-platform), Web applications (React.js, Angular, Bootstrap) and Backend- Node.js and Express.js.
what_do_i_do: I enable teams to hit their key success metrics with my technical guidance and high- quality development. I have architect, designed, developed & maintained multiple software projects from the scratch to help solve real world problems. So whether you are a big company or a startup, or whether you just need some extra technical expertise or someone to undertake outsourced work, I am here to help. Don't hesitate to put forth any inquiries. I can help you to make UI mockups considering the UI/UX perspective, to selecting the correct back-end and front-end technology followed by its development, to installing, configuring the application on staging/production environments. My skill ranges from developing simple websites that need to capture simple data, to huge and complex applications that deals with millions of users, to some out-of-the-box features.
